string-array.name: jokeArray
string-array.item: What do you call a boomerang that won\'t come back?\nA stick!
How does a cucumber become a pickle?\nIt goes through a jarring experience.
What did one toilet say to the other?\nYou look a bit flushed.
What building in your town has the most stories?\nThe public library
What is a computer\'s favorite snack?\nComputer chips
How are dentures like stars?\nThey come out at night.
What did one volcano say to the other?\n I lava you.
How do we know that the ocean is friendly?\nIt waves.
What falls in winter but never gets hurt?\nSnow
What is brown, hairy and wears sunglasses?\nA coconut on vacation
What do you get from a pampered cow?\nSpoiled milk
Why are fish so smart?\nBecause they live in schools.
Why do fish live in salt water?\nBecause pepper makes them sneeze.
What\'s a cat\'s favorite magazine?\nA cat-alogue
What kind of tree fits in your hand?\nA palm tree
